channel.title: BMTC: Welcome to Black Mesa
channel.description:
![](upload://9zUCxievcjZEPkQxFXWJ74vptcM.jpeg) ![](upload://g5dQFwnb8NHPAz071JEfN1C7Va6.jpeg)
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Editor Notes:
Well, the first of the Black Mesa comics, hope you enjoy, I know it's not very long and compared to some of the comics to come, it will be considered quite short.
But that was the intention, this comic is a sort of intro to the style of comic used back on Leak-Free, and a little intro the main members and the type of stereotypes that will be used.
Enjoy.

item.title: BMTC: Welcome to Black Mesa
item.dc:creator: raw_bean
item.description:
geekofalltrades:

Hey raw: I’m already working on a comic about this… and it’s going to be fucking epic. Four chapters are planned. Feel free to throw me your ideas, though.

EDIT: So, Coll, if you had your heart set on working on it too, I suppose we could have a… three way? :jizz:

DOUBLE EDIT: I could use a dead ringer model (TF2) if anyone knows where to find one/wants to make me one.

Haha, looks like you’re already thinking along similar lines to me. I hadn’t planned my idea out very thoroughly yet but I’ll PM you my thoughts later.

Read full topic

item.description:
If I’ve found the right model, check your PMs in a bit, geek.

Read full topic

item.title: BMTC: Welcome to Black Mesa
item.dc:creator: geekofalltrades
item.description:
raw_bean:

Haha, I just had this awesome idea for a comic, but I’m too lazy to learn how to use GMod and do it myself. Anyone wanna collaborate on one? As a tease I’ll tell you that it involves our most recent fail troll and mod punchbag FailCrash/NesKwik/Breifcase/Syn3rgy.

Hey raw: I’m already working on a comic about this… and it’s going to be fucking epic. Four chapters are planned. Feel free to throw me your ideas, though.

EDIT: So, Coll, if you had your heart set on working on it too, I suppose we could have a… three way? :jizz:

DOUBLE EDIT: I could use a dead ringer model (TF2) if anyone knows where to find one/wants to make me one.

Read full topic

item.title: BMTC: Welcome to Black Mesa
item.dc:creator: Collision
item.description:
raw_bean:

Haha, I just had this awesome idea for a comic, but I’m too lazy to learn how to use GMod and do it myself. Anyone wanna collaborate on one? As a tease I’ll tell you that it involves our most recent fail troll and mod punchbag FailCrash/NesKwik/Breifcase/Syn3rgy.

EDIT: Haha, I couldn’t remember all of his different names so I went into the mod CP to check, and I found two more, though they haven’t been used in ages (Tibbles/Tibblez). Jesus that guy was prolific, and retarded.

Now excuse me while I go ban these accounts…

If you want comic done.

An old way done on LF was someone would write it and another would pose.

A lot of the best comics were done this way.

Jambo and I made a great team back in the day.

Read full topic
